features: [High Temperature & Pressure Steam] 2500W high power can generate 229°F/105°C high temperature and 3BAR pressure steam within 10s, effectively remove stubborn greasy dirt and stains.

[6 Speeds Adjustable] With 3 different brush heads, suitable for cleaning walls, cooktop, smoke lampblack, microwave oven, washing machine, refrigerator, and more, widely applied in kitchen, bathroom, furniture, car, etc.
[Practical Handheld Steam Cleaner] With extended rod, long cables, and slip-proof handle, convenient for use, a good assistant for home cleaning, meeting your different daily cleaning needs.
[1L/33.81 Large Capacity Water Tank] Can be used continuously for about 1 hour, no need to add water frequently, improving your cleaning work efficiency; with strong acid resistance, can add lotion.
[Portable Size] 19*15*13cm/ 7.4*5.9*5.1inch mini size with light weight, does not occupy too much space, easy for neat storage, handheld carrying is less tiring.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 2500W high power can generate 229°F/105°C high temperature and 3BAR pressure steam within 10s, effectively remove stubborn greasy dirt and stains. Warm Tips: There is No trigger on handbar, please turn off the power switch if want to stop steaming. It is a high-temperature steam cleaning machine, please do not touch the metal nozzle, do not touch the steam, do not spary at human, pets or the device itself. If the distance from the nozzle is farther, the temperature will be lower, so please put the nozzle close to the surface of the object to be cleaned, the cleaning will be more effective. If worried about accidentally touching the hot nozzle or steam, you can wear heat-resistant gloves, but gloves will make the cleaning process inconvenient, please use it carefully. When cleaning glass products, avoid bursting due to uneven heating. Recommended to be used by adults aged 25~60 who has the physical and mental ability to operate the machine normally. During work, the item needs to remain connected to the power and continue to heat, in order to keep steaming.
1L/34OZ Large water tank Last for 1 hour without frequent refills. 2.2M Steam Tube & 2.5M Power Cord More freedom of movement and easy cleaning. Anti-corrosion interior Grease detergent can be added.

How to Use the Steam Cleaning Machine: 1.Add the water; 2.Plug the power; 3.Turn on the power switch, meantime hold the spray handle, the machine will start to spray steam about 10 seconds after the indicator light is on.(It is normal that water flows out before spraying steam.) 4.The spray nozzle is aimed at the surface of object, turn clockwise the regulator to increase the water vapor content, turn counterclockwise to decrease. 5.Turn off the power switch, unplug the power; 6.Drain the water in the tank and pipe, wipe off the water of machine with dry cloth.

How to Use the Steam Cleaning Machine: 1.Add the water; 2.Plug the power; 3.Turn on the power switch, meantime hold the spray handle, the machine will start to spray steam about 10 seconds after the indicator light is on.(It is normal that water flows out before spraying steam.) 4.The spray nozzle is aimed at the surface of object, turn clockwise the regulator to increase the water vapor content, turn counterclockwise to decrease. 5.Turn off the power switch, unplug the power; 6.Drain the water in the tank and pipe, wipe off the water of machine with dry cloth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It worked great. But after the first use, it stopped working and had to return

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Has many good features
reviews.reviewText: I like that this unit holds 3.5 cups of water giving you alot of steam before refilling the reservoir, and easy to refill holding tank is not under pressure. Using the wand and the steam hose is so much better than my old handheld, you can direct the steam in any direction without holding the whole unit. I already used it to clean gunk off my glass top stove and it did that without any effort. Used it in the shower to clean soap scum and grout lines. At first it worked but was alot of work, but when I applied a soap scum remover and then steamed it off - great results and easy. Attachments are useful. Reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is that you can't control the steam flow only way to stop it is to turn the machine off. Handle does get hot after a while, as others have noted. Overall a useful tool better than my last one that you had to hold the whole unit to direct the steam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets the small tough jobs done!
reviews.reviewText: Originally wanted to steam 12 years of wear and tare off my kitchen wood cabinet doors, but for a first test I cleaned up 15 years worth of caked on dirt and grime from my old Hoover industrial vacuum canister and hepa filter container screen. It came out spotless and looking like new! With the extension pipe I got into nooks and crannies I never would have reached with just my hand. Stuff I probably would've ended up scratching the plastic trying to get clean. Took a moment to get going, but nothing to bad. Puts out a good amount of steam for small jobs, had to put the nozzle right up close for the pressure to work on the really caked on areas and went thru it like butter. Hit my finger tips a couple times with the deflected steam, but wasn't hot enough to do any harm. Then again I'm used to working on hot engine/transmission parts with my bare hands. Few seconds doesn't bother ya. Not exactly scalding hot. I used a couple bottles of spring water, as I'm not about to buy distilled. I hear adding a little vinegar helps the process. I'll try that when I tackle the toaster oven tomorrow. I wanted to try this one out for its size, I'm limited to where I can hide the nifty household gadgets. All in all I'd say it's worth every penny. So long as it lasts a while, I'm a happy camper. I've got a whole list of things lined up for this little gem. Tub and tile grout, bathroom sink formica surface, built up black soot on old ceramic propane fire pit logs, built up grime around door knobs, fish tank and equipment, pond, fountain and water fall nick nacks that have been out in the weather for years, the door seal on the old dish washer and if it ain't broke by then.... My 30 year old Zayer's special Grill Master. I like that its very light to hold, but the cord and sprayer hose are plenty long enough to set it down anywhere your cleaning. I've also got some old lawn furniture that has that green algae tint on the legs that this would make short work of. I bet you could steam clean an engine real nice too, without harming any wires or hoses. Has many many applications. Wonder how well it would do on tough carpet stains with the wet/dry vac to suck out the dirt, would make life much easier than having to set up a big carpet steam cleaner just for a small area. I'll be back for an update once I get all these odd jobs taken care of. For now, looks like it's well worth the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So the adjustment on the steam rate does absolutely nothing. It's full steam ahead. The grip sucks is your actually trying to do detail work. If you want to use brushes just quit while your ahead as they themselves are good brushes but you can't get hold of anything to actually brush something. I don't mind a little pain and grind but the plastic threads feel like they are going to give at any point which would cause much more pain than I'm willing to chance. But it does steam for sure and fairly quickly.Unit is designed to be garbage after the heating unit. Tank size at the rate it steams is to little. Grip is horrible. Anything but the small one inch brush is to much for the handle to hold let alone any scrubbing power.I think it might be cool in illinois winters to go out in sub zero Temps and make it snow.This unit is so badly advertised and such a bad product the seller should be ashamed.But I do note, I've cleaned 2 door cards (apologies to the passenger side of my jeep) and one 3x5 carpet format (with the assistance of a pressure washer). All three turned out fantastic. I mean minus the three 2nd degree burns from the handle and various words I shared when it "bit" me due to the lack of any ability to put any force into this.I would not recommend the product nor would I the seller. This is obviously garbage but I had to spend the money to prove it to myself. I'm saving you the trial and tribulation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Gets the job done.
reviews.reviewText: I really love this steamer it gets hot enough for my needs , but poor design, the switch had to be replaced do to heat ,it leaked a little but after Ireplaced the switch it leaks a lot ,I can fix that but it shouldn't leak in the first place. If it had a few more attachment that could use cloth and Window squeezes It would say a step .I still recommend it to anyone that likes high heat I steamed the inside and out side of my car look beautiful .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: worked great! cleaned soap build up off shower, no problem....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A M A Z I N G
reviews.reviewText: Wonderfully designed steamer with a see-through water tank. Rubber cap that does not need to cool down before opening, it is a powerful little machine and has helped me cut through the most unspeakable grime. However, the on/off switch on my unit is defective - it would not switch off and I had to cut power by unplugging it, which wasn't the safest. I have reported to the manufacturer and they are sending a new unit out right away.
Great steamer. Note gets very hot not suitable for plastic. Great on leather and durable materials. Works great on jewelry also.

reviews.reviewTitle: good to use, really helpful to clean stubborn stains
reviews.reviewText: the steam is strong enough, i cleaned lofts of stubborn stains in the kitchen and washroom, but the body of the machine has a little problem, the brass screw nut on the root of the nozzle will be loose after working some while , just like a brass bush without any thread on it (in fact, i believe it is the plastic body of the nozzle got shrinkage after heat), i returned one, and bought another one, but still same, anyway, i still would like to give it 4 stars, or else i will give it total 5 stars, it's really helpful to clean stubborn stains

The media could not be loaded. I wasn't very happy when I received this thing because I thought it was much smaller than what I expected.After I tried it, once, I thought I might use it eventually and decided to keep it but I already knew it was not good.- it is very small- when it heats up, there's a lot of water wasted before it turns into steam- brushes are useless.Now is the second time I use it and... It leaks just above the handle. Therefore there's no steam goind out and you cannot handle it as it is very hot.Pay a higher price, rent one.... But DO NOT purchase this item.

reviews.reviewTitle: It's a bit clunky, but what a tool for the price!!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to clean mildew and remove old caulking from my shower. It made the cleaning a ton easier than without it. Then I took apart the stinky drain plumbing in my washing machine and used this to soften and remove hard water stains like nothing. My 8 year old (who is admittedly very good with tools etc) was able to handle it no problem. The steam pressure is just ok, but it gets the job done and for the price I'm so happy I have this now... I keep thinking of more things I could use it on!

The best cleaning too. Unfortunately this the second one and within two months start having heating problems. The first one broke before a year of use. This one starts having issues much faster. If this one brakes before a year of use, I am done with them.
